constituent: stimulate, person, leg, mouth, mending, mend
koohiiStory1: Mr T, ever the optimist, is trying to stimulate Capt Ahab´s wooden leg by rubbing it down. Capt Ahab normally wouldn´t let anyone do that, but he appreciates Mr T´s stimulating conversation.
koohiiStory2: You stimulate a person by giving him a kick.
words:
促す(うながす): to urge, to press, to suggest, to demand, to stimulate, to quicken, to incite, to invite (attention to)
促進(そくしん): promotion, acceleration, encouragement, facilitation, spurring on
催促(さいそく): request, demand, claim, urge (action), press for
